name: CABLEBEL
membership: Cablebel is a member of Europacable
memberOrga: KW Eupen, Nexans Benelux, Opticable, Abitana
goal:
Cablebel is the Belgian association of the cable manufacturers.
Cablebel is the link between his members and National Legal authorities, Europacable, Cenelec, IEC, ....
interests: Climate Action, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Standardization through CENELEC
Application of the EU Regulations & Directives : CPR, LVD, EMC, ...
